title: sanmArga sAdhanamE
sahitya:
sanmArga sAdhanamE anudinamE sadA bhakti ArAdhanamE manamE sanmArga sAdhanamE 
inda jagattinil ihapara sukhattinai aDaindiDa paghait-tiraL ozhindiDap-paran aruL pozhindiDavE


anupallavi

  dunmArga vinaigLait-tUruDan pOkkiyE tudi japa tavattAl matip-polivAkkiyE
shuddha sutantara sattiya samarasa shakti vaLara para mukti nalamoLira


caraNam 1    nara sukham tEDiyE paraparattODiyE naghai tuyar isai vasai mighai sheyya
 vADiyE para sukhattai marandE iravu paghal alaindE kAsukkum ulagin 
sabhAsukkum ponmaNI dUsukkum takkapaDi nAsukkAi naDittenna pUjai 
malaraik-koNDu vEsaikku muDippadO nEsak-kalaiyai ashA pAshattil aDaippadO
    caraNam 2    mukkaraNangaLum pakkuvamAgavE mUla haktik-kanal mEluyardEgavE
sikkaru cittattir-cirsukham sokkavE shiva tattuvam shiva sattuvamAghavE
